post.body: OMG! Chickens! Bok bok! :)
Paint
60s. I grew up in the 80s and love some of the less popular stuff, but the 60s were revolutionary.
Loved the snow photos!
Ooo a Yule log and a dog! I love GPs. (Goodies Unlimited has one; I always enjoy visiting w/ him when I pick up soap!)
Are you there yet? :(
Hope you feel better!
No; we usually have family visit us, but this year we'll be all alone.
Got the recipe email. Thank you! (I forget you know where I live when I'm at work! o.O)
I am going to have to find a recipe for finikia now. I'm a grecophile and they sound awesome!
(SKBI obviously out. Most other links are old & broken. Can't see much on Pat's Backyard Bird Cam. :()
KSBI Lake Hefner webcam has been offline for weeks. Looking for replacement "window" for my iGoogle page. No NW OKC cams to be found. :P
Talked w/ school principal; most questions answered & concerned addressed. Went through EAP & have Sat 10 am appt for B.
New work schedule: 8:30 am - 5 pm, only 30 mins for lunch. Boo hiss. Prefer wk comp to laptop @ hm (actually); sad to have less time on it.
Eating lunch @ my desk. Leftover orange chicken w/ rice. Delicious.
Ow! Srsly need to buy plastic / rubber cushion for desk support @ wk. Keep banging my knee on it!
I. AM. GOING. TO. KILL. MY. SON.
Watched Rudolph & Year w/out a Santa Claus tonight. Pretty sure B will go to school tomorrow; he and R were squabbling tonight.
(Have not yet pulled out the Xmas decor I got from my Secret Santa this year; still hope someone else would love to use it.)
Xmas decorations almost done! "It's not too much Xmas, is it?" I asked B. B said "It's NEVER too much Xmas!"
Had an awesome lunch; benefit of being home w/ washable plates & microwave! Broccoli cheese soup & the last of the smoked ham. :)
Home w/ Sick Boy. Still. Again. Upside is toast w/ butter & strawberry jelly for breakfast & loose Intntl Pantry Ashby Ceylon orange pekoe.
No way to remember what I was interested in. Thanks, Goodreads.
All of the books I put in my Goodreads to read shelf (and then deleted from other lists) have disappeared.
Poop. Kids' class @ ED library re: Setting Up Your First Aquarium. Can't attend as conflicts w/ B's bday party (hope he's not still sick!)
Bliss is when your family saves you the last brownie (especially when it's the corner piece) and you have a warm fire. :)
R has been carrying nonfunctional Guitar Hero game around w/ him all day for two days.
Also today: a bio of Cate Blanchett and Growing Up Polar Bear.
Just had homemade gourmet gingerbread bundt cake.
I have a fire in the fireplace, candles burning, and am sitting down to a Christmas tradition of Hickory Farms.
Saw The Nutcracker, spent too much on gifts for the boys, and has made (but not decorated) cookies with lots of youthful help! :)
I've been away from Twitter over the weekend; so busy with life and Christmas activities!
I FUCKING HATE LIST CHECKING DAY!!! I HATE IT! HATE HATE HATE!!!
I WISH PEOPLE WOULD SHUT UP SO I CAN THINK!!!
Plus I have to print out tomorrow's agenda, haven't even spoken to the DL presenter, have 709s & a cart to process by Fri end of day...
Am now crying quietly in my cubicle because I'm not even 1/2 done with List Checking and have only 3 hrs to finish it.
Carolers and bells from St. Luke's in the atrium.
MUARG. (This is the day for groany all-cap intros.) Good thing I wore a cardi to work 'cause now it's wrapped around my waist as camouflage.
AUGH!!! V. tired of 8:30 am traffic. Son gets negative pts for making me 1 hr late every day. This am: pea soup + a 3-car pileup. :P
